snippet: The Visa Waiver Program, which is under intense scrutiny by Congress, is considered crucial to the multibillion-dollar travel and tourism business from New York to Florida to Las Vegas to San Francisco.
abstract: Carl Hulse On Washington column examines potential impact of Pres Obama's reference to Visa Waiver Program, in Oval Office address about San Bernadino terrorist attacks, on travel industry; notes that while reference was apparently in error, program remains under intense scrutiny as officials search for solutions to nation's security vulnerabilities; program is considered crucial to multi-billion dollar travel and tourism business across entire nation.
lead_paragraph: The Visa Waiver Program, which is under intense scrutiny by Congress, is considered crucial to the multibillion-dollar travel and tourism business from New York to Florida to Las Vegas to San Francisco.

headline.print_headline: Travel Industry in Motion as Visas Are Reviewed
headline.main: Travel Industry in Motion as Visas Are Reviewed
